doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 42 [2]--The Right Stuff[Air Date: 10/13/1987]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 42 [2]--The Right Stuff[Air Date: 10/13/1987]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Gay Week in Review, with Andy Humm, Jim Levin, David Strah, and Michael Hirsch, sponsored by the Human Rights Campaign Fund 2.Discussion about gay personal relationshipsCOMMERCIAL:Human Rights Campaign Fund Dinner3.Discussion about ACT-UP and the changing face of gay activismCOMMERCIAL: Human Rights Campaign Fund Dinner4.Discussion about the conservative publication, "The Wanderer."5.News Watch, State of California passed bills to allow tests to treat AIDS6.Representative Gerry Studs demands an investigation on the failure of the Regan administration to properly deal with AIDS and AIDS education7.British Medical Journal states that the HIV Virus Antibody tests can take up to 14 months for a detection8.Milwaukee gay community protests radio station WQFM for homophobic radio show9.Announcements about LGBT events10.GCN Sports, Soccer team, The Ramblers win a game in Boston, Football player Rich [Syler] faces charges of second degree murder,Virgin Islands announces that they are going to field a team for the 1988 Winter Olympics11.Lavender Heatlh, interview with Don Lorimer, Lower East Side AIDS Coordinator12.Closing Credits
The Right Stuff:1.Show Bitz, discussion about the gay play, "What's New"COMMERCIAL:The Islanders Club2.Naming Names, criticism about the portrayal of a gay character in the movie, "No Way Out"COMMERCIAL:Human Rights Campaign Fund DinnerCOMMERCIAL:The Monster 3.Razor Sharp, talks about the play, "20's, 30's, 40's", The Fetish Ball, and Raw HideCOMMERCIAL:Gay Treasures4.GCN soap opera, "Georgia Vice," episode "Georgia Vice's Day Off"COMMERCIAL:The Monster5. "Short Bits of Wisdom From Daddy" by Perry Brass6.Closing Credits
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 42 [2]--The Right Stuff[Air Date: 10/13/1987]: October 1987
